00019 #include "listener.h"
00020 
00021 void *s_lsthreadstart(void* vid)
00022 {
00023         ((Listener*)vid)->threadstart();
00024         return NULL;
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 Listener::Listener(int port, Sequencer* seq)
00029 {
00030         lport=port;
00031         sequencer=seq;
00032         //start a listener thread
00033         pthread_create(&thread, NULL, s_lsthreadstart, this);
00034 }
00035 
00036 Listener::~Listener(void)
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 void Listener::threadstart()
00041 {
00042         logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Listerer thread starting");
00043         //here we start
00044         SWInetSocket listSocket;
00045         SWBaseSocket::SWBaseError error;
00046         //manage the listening socket
00047         listSocket.bind(lport, &error);
00048         if (error!=SWBaseSocket::ok)
00049         {
00050                 //this is an error!
00051                 logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"FATAL Listerer: %s", error.get_error().c_str());
00052                 //there is nothing we can do here
00053                 exit(1);
00054                 return;
00055         }
00056         listSocket.listen();
00057         //await connections
00058         logmsgf(LOG_WARN,"Listener ready");
00059         while (1)
00060         {
00061                 logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Listener awaiting connections");
00062                 SWInetSocket *ts=(SWInetSocket *)listSocket.accept(&error);
00063                 logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Listener got a new connection");
00064                 if (error!=SWBaseSocket::ok) 
00065                 {
00066                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"ERROR Listener: %s", error.get_error().c_str());
00067                         continue;
00068                 }
00069                 //receive a magic
00070                 int type;
00071                 unsigned int source;
00072                 unsigned int len;
00073                 char buffer[256];
00074                 if (Messaging::receivemessage(ts, &type, &source, &len, buffer, 256))
00075                 {
00076                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"ERROR Listener: receiving first message");
00077                         ts->disconnect(&error);
00078                         delete ts;
00079                         continue;
00080                 }
00081                 if (type==MSG2_HELLO)
00082                 {
00083                         logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Listener sending version");
00084                         //send the version information back
00085                         if (Messaging::sendmessage(ts, MSG2_VERSION, 0, (int)strlen(RORNET_VERSION), RORNET_VERSION))
00086                         {
00087                                 logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"ERROR Listener: sending version");
00088                                 ts->disconnect(&error);
00089                                 delete ts;
00090                                 continue;
00091                         }
00092 
00093                         if(!strncmp(buffer, RORNET_VERSION, strlen(RORNET_VERSION)))
00094                         {
00095                                 //receive user name
00096                                 if (Messaging::receivemessage(ts, &type, &source, &len, buffer, 256))
00097                                 {
00098                                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"ERROR Listener: receiving user name");
00099                                         ts->disconnect(&error);
00100                                         delete ts;
00101                                         continue;
00102                                 }
00103                                 if (type==MSG2_USER)
00104                                 {
00105                                         //create a new client
00106                                         //correct a bit the client name (trucate, validate)
00107                                         if (len>20) len=20;
00108                                         buffer[len]=0;
00109                                         for (unsigned int i=0; i<len; i++) if (buffer[i]<32 || buffer[i]>127 || buffer[i]==';') buffer[i]='#';
00110                                         logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Listener creating a new client (%s)", buffer);
00111                                         sequencer->createClient(ts, buffer);
00112                                 }
00113                                 else
00114                                 {
00115                                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Warning Listener: no user name");
00116                                         ts->disconnect(&error);
00117                                         delete ts;
00118                                 }
00119                         }
00120                         else
00121                         {
00122                                 logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"ERROR Listener: bad version");
00123                                 ts->disconnect(&error);
00124                                 delete ts;
00125                         }
00126                 }
00127                 else
00128                 {
00129                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"ERROR Listener: No Hello");
00130                         ts->disconnect(&error);
00131                         delete ts;
00132                 }
00133         }
00134 }
